oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of David Lyon Thomson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Encased tintype of David Lyon Thomson, Co. C, S. C. Beaufort Lt. Arty., CSA. The full portrait shows Thomson in uniform with a pistol on his belt and holding a bayoneted rifle. See tsla124, tsla125, and tsla126 for images of Thomson's brothers and mother.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
